name: format data
Purge Log100 days
format data
func:
var d = new Date().toJSON().slice(5,19).replace('T', ' ')

if (msg.payload.DrvMotTemp < -50.0) { msg.payload.DrvMotTemp = null;}
if (msg.payload.CMotTemp < -50.0) { msg.payload.CMotTemp = null;}
if (msg.payload.GPSHead < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSHead = null;}
if (msg.payload.GPSHdop < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSHdop = null;}
if (msg.payload.GPSSpd < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSSpd = null;}
if (msg.payload.GPSAlt < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSAlt = null;}
if (msg.payload.GPSLat < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSLat = 45.369;}
if (msg.payload.GPSLon < -999.0) { msg.payload.GPSLon = 5.611;}
if (msg.payload.Pitch == "nan") { msg.payload.Pitch = null;}
if (msg.payload.Roll == "nan") { msg.payload.Roll = null;}

var tmp =[
    msg.payload.State,
    msg.payload.Error,
    msg.payload.BatVolt,
    msg.payload.ChargeCur,
    msg.payload.BatSOC,
    msg.payload.BatCharging,
    msg.payload.DrvMotTemp,
    msg.payload.DrvMotTempEr,
    msg.payload.DrvMotFan,
    msg.payload.RMotCur,
    msg.payload.RMotSpd,
    msg.payload.LMotCur,
    msg.payload.LMotSpd,
    msg.payload.CMotTemp,
    msg.payload.CMotTempEr,
    msg.payload.CMotFan,
    msg.payload.CMotCur,
    msg.payload.CMotSpd,
    msg.payload.CMotAlm,
    msg.payload.FSnrDist,
    msg.payload.RSnrDist,
    msg.payload.LSnrDist,
    msg.payload.CompHead,
    msg.payload.GPSHead/100,
    msg.payload.GPSSat,
    msg.payload.GPSHdop,
    msg.payload.GPSSpd,
    msg.payload.GPSAlt,
    msg.payload.GPSLat,
    msg.payload.GPSLon,
    msg.payload.Mag,
    msg.payload.SMag,
    msg.payload.InOut,
    msg.payload.Pitch,
    msg.payload.Roll,
    msg.payload.Obstcl,
    msg.payload.MowTim,
    msg.payload.RSSI,
    msg.payload.Heap,
    msg.payload.CPUTemp
]

msg.payload = tmp

msg.topic ="INSERT INTO AutoMower_telemetry ( `Time`, `State`, `ErrorNumber`, `BatteryVoltage`,`BatteryChargeCurrent`,`BatterySOC`,`BatteryCharging`,`DriveMotorTemperature`,`DriveMotorTemperatureErr`,`DriveMotorFan`,`RightMotorCurrent`,`RightMotorSpeed`,`LeftMotorCurrent`,`LeftMotorSpeed`,`CutMotorTemperature`,`CutMotorTemperatureErr`,`CutMotorFan`,`CutMotorCurrent`,`CutMotorSpeed`,`CutMotorAlarm`," +
" `FrontSonarDistance`,`RightSonarDistance`,`LeftSonarDistance`, `CompassHeading`,`GPSHeading`, `GPSSatellitesFix`, `GPSHdop`, `GPSSpeed`, `GPSAltitude`, `GPSLatitude`, `GPSLongitude`, `Magnitude`, `SmoothMagnitude`, `Inside`, `Pitch`, `Roll`, `TotalObstacles`, `TotalMowingTime`, `RSSI`, `Heap`, `CPUTemperature`)" +
"VALUES (TIMESTAMP(NOW()),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);"

node.status({fill:"green",shape:"ring",text:d});

return msg ;

name: Receive counter
Purge Telemetry 100 days
